node.name: OOEclipse
node.shortdescription:
OOEclipse is a set of plugins for the OpenOffice.org extensions developers. It brings UNO and OpenOffice.org specific wizards and tools on top of the existing language plugins. It currently supports only Java, but C++ support is on the way.

Below are some of its features:

  • OpenOffice.org extension creation wizard
  • OXT export wizard
  • UNO client project creation wizard
node.body:
OOEclipse is a set of plugins for the OpenOffice.org extensions developers. It brings UNO and OpenOffice.org specific wizards and tools on top of the existing language plugins. It currently supports only Java, but C++ support is on the way.

Below are some of its features:

  • OpenOffice.org extension creation wizard
  • OXT export wizard
  • UNO client project creation wizard
